moves.1. e4: This is game that i won and took 26 points...The whole game was quite strange for me...Write comments or rate the game if you want...
moves.2. exd5 Qxd5 3. Nc3 Qa5 4. d4: i played d4 but i regreted later...
moves.4... e5 5. dxe5 Qxe5+ 6. Be2 Nc6 7. Nf3: I'm safe but i did not play well at the open...
moves.8... Bd7 9. Nd5 Qd6 10. Re1 O-O-O 11. Ng: I'm trying to attack somehow as the pawns in the centre were missing...
moves.12. c4 h6 13. Ne4 Qe5 14. Bf3: Well i think f3 with the pawn would be better...
moves.17... f5 18. Ng3 Qxe1+: i replied with my knight cause i didn't want to lose my queen...
moves.19. Nf1 Qe5: I'm a rook down unfortunately...But i have to attack..
moves.20. Bf4 Qc5: He wanted an exchange but i didn't...
moves.21. Qf7: I'm moving with my queen to his king..
moves.21... Nge7 22. Qe8+: I thought check would be a nice idea...
moves.22... Nd8 23. Rd1: And Rd1!.... I was pushing him to lose his queen....Somehow i took advantage and the whole thing was not so bad! He must lose his queen otherwise he'd be checkmated...
moves.23... Qd6: And now is bye bye queen...
moves.24. Bxd6 cxd6: Well i don't know if it would be better if i'd had taken hie rook...What do you think?
moves.25. Rxd6 Nec6: He's trying to defend...Well now i'm thinking if   26.Bxc6 would be good...
moves.27. Rxd8+: I decided to take his knight and then take his rook...otherwise it would be  27. Qg6 .....
moves.27... Nxd8 28. Qxe5: I'm up a queen though he still had a rook that was sleeping....
moves.28... g6: My attitude now was to move quickly for a checkmate...But 29.Qxh8 would be good as well...
moves.30. Nd5: Now the knight took a nice place....
moves.30... Nc6: He might not realised that he's gonna be ckeckmated...He would have avoided that....
moves.31. Qc7#: So at the end my attitude for a quick checkmate was proved though he would have saved it..
